ranks.name: Epics, Born on a Blank Slate
ranks.desc: When Demiurge triggers the Memosprite Skill "Ode to Ego" during the use of "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes," gains 6 "Recollection" point(s) and increases the number of bounces for this attack by 12.

ranks.name: A Tomorrow in Thirteen Shades
ranks.desc: When entering combat, additionally gains 12 "Recollection" point(s). For every 1 different ally character that gains the Memosprite Skill buff from Demiurge, the DMG multiplier for the True DMG dealt by ally targets via the Skill's Zone increases by 6%, up to a max increase of 24%.

ranks.name: By Thy Being, As I've Written
ranks.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Please Write On, With a Smile
ranks.desc: After every 1 use of "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes" by Demiurge, the Bounce DMG multiplier for the triggered Memosprite Skill "Ode to Ego" increases by 6% in the current battle, stacking up to 24 times.

ranks.name: Gaze, Steeped in Yesterbloom
ranks.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.
Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

ranks.name: Remembrance, Sung in Ripples ♪
ranks.desc:
When Cyrene uses Ultimate for the first time, all allies advance action by 100%. Each time Demiurge triggers the Memosprite Skill "Ode to Ego" during the use of "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes," gains the following effects based on the number of times it has been triggered in the current battle:
1 time: When Demiurge is on the field, reduces all enemy targets' DEF by 20%.
2 times and more: All allies advance action by 24%.

skills.name: Lo, Hope Takes Flight!
skills.simple_desc: Gains "Recollection" and deals minor Ice DMG to one enemy.
skills.desc: Gains #2[i] "Recollection" point(s) and deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Cyrene's Max HP to one designated enemy.

skills.name: Bloom, Elysium of Beyond
skills.simple_desc: Gains "Recollection" and deploys a Zone. Additionally deals True DMG after all ally targets deal DMG.
skills.desc: Gains #3[i] "Recollection" point(s) and deploys a Zone that lasts for #2[i] turns. The Zone's duration decreases by 1 at the start of Cyrene's every turn. While the Zone lasts, for each instance of DMG dealt by all ally targets, deals 1 additional instance of True DMG equal to #1[i]% of the original DMG. When Cyrene is downed, the Zone will also be dispelled.

skills.name: Verse ◦ Vow ∞
skills.simple_desc: Summons memosprite Demiurge, causes it to immediately gain 1 extra turn, and activates all teammates' Ultimate. Then, enters the "Ripples of Past Reverie" state and gains Enhanced Basic ATK. Increases Cyrene's and Demiurge's CRIT Rate, and deploys the Zone effect from Skill with no duration limit.
skills.desc:
Summons memosprite Demiurge, causes it to immediately gain 1 extra turn, and activates all teammates' Ultimate. Then, enters the "Ripples of Past Reverie" state. Enhances Basic ATK to "To Love and Tomorrow ♪" and can only use this Basic ATK. Increases Cyrene's and Demiurge's CRIT Rate by #3[i]%, and deploys the Zone effect from Skill with no duration limit.
Can only be used once per battle. Demiurge's initial Max HP equals to #1[i]% of Cyrene's Max HP.

skills.name: Hearts Gather as One
skills.simple_desc: When combat begins or after Cyrene takes action, teammates and their memosprites gain "Future." When ally targets with "Future" take action, Cyrene gains "Recollection." While Cyrene is on the field, increases DMG dealt by ally targets.
skills.desc: When combat begins or after Cyrene takes action, other ally characters under any state and their memosprites gain "Future." When ally targets with "Future" take action, consumes "Future" to grant Cyrene #1[i] "Recollection" point(s). When Cyrene has #4[i] "Recollection" points, can activate Ultimate and dispel all debuffs on her. When she has #5[i] "Recollection" points during the "Ripples of Past Reverie" state, can activate Ultimate. After reaching the maximum, it can overflow by up to #3[i] points. While Cyrene is on the field, increases DMG dealt by all ally targets by #2[f1]%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.simple_desc: Attacks an enemy, and after entering combat, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.desc: Attacks an enemy, and after entering combat, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: Peace at West Wind's End
skills.simple_desc: Creates a Special Dimension around the character. Enemies within this dimension enter the "This Moment, Forever" state while ally characters within this dimension have increased movement speed. After entering combat, deploys the Skill's Zone.
skills.desc: After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for #1[i] second(s) around the character. Enemies within this Special Dimension enter the "This Moment, Forever" state. While in this state, enemies will cease all actions. Ally characters within this Special Dimension have #2[i]% increased movement speed. After entering combat within the duration, deploys the Skill's Zone. Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.

skills.name: To Love and Tomorrow ♪
skills.simple_desc: Gains "Recollection" and deals Ice DMG to all enemies.
skills.desc:
Gains #2[i] "Recollection" points and deals Ice DMG equal to #3[i]% of Cyrene's Max HP to one designated enemy. Then, deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Cyrene's Max HP to all enemies.
"To Love and Tomorrow ♪" cannot recover Skill Points.

skills.name: Reunion at First Sight
skills.simple_desc: Enables Demiurge to immediately gain 1 extra turn.
skills.desc: Enables Demiurge to immediately gain 1 extra turn.

skills.name: Attack
skills.simple_desc: Attacks an enemy, and after entering combat, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.
skills.desc: Attacks an enemy, and after entering combat, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

skills.name: Minuet of Blooms and Plumes
skills.simple_desc: Deals Ice DMG to all enemies.
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG to all enemies equal to #1[i]% of Demiurge's Max HP.

skills.name: This Ode, to All Lives
skills.simple_desc: Applies a buff to one ally character. When the character is a Chrysos Heir, the target gains a special effect. When the character is not a Chrysos Heir, increases the target's DMG dealt. This effect also applies on memosprites.
skills.desc: Applies a buff to one designated ally character. When the character is a Chrysos Heir, the target gains a special effect. When the character is not a Chrysos Heir, increases the target's DMG dealt by #2[i]% for #3[i] turns. This effect also applies on memosprites.

skills.name: Waiting, In Every Past
skills.simple_desc: When changes occur on Cyrene's HP, Demiurge's HP will also change accordingly. While Demiurge is on the field, Cyrene's Max HP increases.
skills.desc: Demiurge's SPD remains at 0, and it will not appear on the Action Order. While on the field, it is considered as Out-of-Bounds. When Cyrene's HP percentage changes, Demiurge's HP percentage will also change accordingly. While Demiurge is on the field, Cyrene's and Demiurge's Max HP increases by #1[i]%. After Demiurge uses abilities, decreases the duration of all Continuous Effects on this unit by 1.

skills.name: "Hello, World ♪"
skills.simple_desc: When summoned, dispels Crowd Control debuffs from all allies.
skills.desc: When Demiurge is summoned, dispels Crowd Control debuffs from all allies.

skills.name: Ode to Genesis
skills.simple_desc: Effective for the entire battle. When used on Trailblazer (Remembrance), increases Trailblazer (Remembrance)'s ATK and CRIT Rate. This effect also applies to Mem. After Trailblazer (Remembrance) uses Enhanced Basic ATK, Demiurge immediately gains 1 extra turn and automatically uses "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes."
skills.desc: Effective for the entire battle. When used on Trailblazer (Remembrance), increases Trailblazer (Remembrance)'s ATK by an amount equal to #1[i]% of Demiurge's Max HP, and increases Trailblazer (Remembrance)'s CRIT Rate by an amount equal to #2[i]% of Demiurge's CRIT Rate. This effect also applies to Mem. After Trailblazer (Remembrance) uses Enhanced Basic ATK in this battle, Demiurge immediately gains 1 extra turn and automatically uses "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes." If the target was defeated before this ability is used, it will be used on newly appeared enemy targets instead.

skills.name: Ode to Romance
skills.simple_desc: One-time effect. When used on Aglaea, immediately stacks Aglaea's Memosprite Talent's SPD Boost effect to its upper limit. After Aglaea or Garmentmaker uses an attack, regenerates Energy. Increases DMG dealt by Aglaea and Garmentmaker, and ignores targets' DEF.
skills.desc: One-time effect. When used on Aglaea, causes Aglaea to gain "Romance" and immediately stacks Garmentmaker's Memosprite Talent's SPD Boost effect to its upper limit. After Aglaea or Garmentmaker uses an attack, consumes "Romance" and regenerates #1[i] Energy. Increases DMG dealt by Aglaea and Garmentmaker by #2[i]%, and ignores #3[i]% of the targets' DEF, lasting until Aglaea exits the "Supreme Stance" state.

skills.name: Ode to Passage
skills.simple_desc: Effective for the entire battle. When used on Tribbie, causes DMG dealt by Tribbie to ignore enemies' DEF. When Tribbie launches Follow-Up ATK and triggers the Additional DMG from Tribbie's Zone, it further deals 1 instance(s) of Additional DMG.
skills.desc: Effective for the entire battle. When used on Tribbie, causes DMG dealt by Tribbie to ignore #2[i]% of enemies' DEF. When Tribbie launches Follow-Up ATK and triggers the Additional DMG from Tribbie's Zone, it further deals #1[i] instance(s) of Additional DMG.

skills.name: Ode to Strife
skills.simple_desc: One-time effect. When used on Mydei, removes Crowd Control debuffs. And if Mydei is in the "Vendetta" state, he automatically uses "Godslayer Be God" and increases his CRIT DMG. If he is not in the "Vendetta" state, Mydei's action advances.
skills.desc: One-time effect. When used on Mydei, removes all Crowd Control debuffs inflicted on him. And if Mydei is in the "Vendetta" state, he automatically uses 1 instance of "Godslayer Be God" without consuming Charge. Mydei's CRIT DMG increases by #1[i]% during this attack. If the target gets defeated before the use, then it will target the newly arriving enemy targets instead. If Mydei is not in the "Vendetta" state, then advances Mydei's action by #2[i]%.

skills.name: Ode to Life and Death
skills.simple_desc: Effective for the entire battle. When used on Castorice, "Newbud" can overflow. When summoning Netherwing, consumes all overflowing "Newbud." Based on the overflow amount, increases the multiplier for the DMG dealt when this summoned Netherwing triggers the ability effect of its Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins." If there are fewer than a certain number of enemy targets, the DMG multiplier additionally increases.
skills.desc: Effective for the entire battle. When used on Castorice, "Newbud" can overflow up to #3[i]%. When summoning Netherwing, consumes all overflowing "Newbud." For every 1% overflow amount consumed, increases the multiplier by #2[f2]% for the DMG dealt when this summoned Netherwing triggers the ability effect of its Talent "Wings Sweep the Ruins." If there are #6[i] enemy target(s) or fewer on the field when summoned, the DMG multiplier additionally increases by #5[f2]%.

skills.name: Ode to Reason
skills.simple_desc: One-time effect. When used on Anaxa, recovers Skill Point(s) for allies and enables Anaxa to take action immediately. Skill has more instances of DMG. All Erudition characters have increased ATK and Skill DMG dealt.
skills.desc: One-time effect. When used on Anaxa, recovers #4[i] Skill Point(s) for allies and enables Anaxa to take action immediately. Skill has #1[i] more instances of DMG, lasting for 1 turn. The next time Anaxa uses Basic ATK or Skill, he gains "True Knowledge": All Erudition characters have their ATK increased by #3[i]% and their dealt Skill DMG increased by #2[i]%, lasting until the start of Anaxa's next turn.

skills.name: Ode to Sky
skills.simple_desc: When Demiurge uses Memosprite Skill, enables Hyacine to gain 2 stacks of "Ode to Sky." When used on Hyacine, regenerates Energy for Hyacine. When Hyacine has "Ode to Sky" and is providing healing, additionally increases the amount to be included in the healing tally of Little Ica's Memosprite Skill.
skills.desc: When Demiurge uses Memosprite Skill, causes Hyacine to gain 2 stacks of "Ode to Sky." When used on Hyacine, regenerates #2[i] Energy for Hyacine. When Hyacine has "Ode to Sky" and is providing healing, additionally increases the amount to be included in the tally of Little Ica's Memosprite Skill by an amount equal to #1[i]% of the current healing amount. After Hyacine uses Skill/Ultimate, consumes 1 stack of "Ode to Sky."

skills.name: Ode to Trickery
skills.simple_desc: Effective for the entire battle. When used on Cipher, increases the DMG dealt by Cipher, and decreases the enemy targets' DEF. The DEF of the "Patron" further decreases.
skills.desc: Effective for the entire battle. When used on Cipher, increases the DMG dealt by Cipher by #1[i]%, decreases the DEF of the "Patron" by #2[i]% and decreases the DEF of all other enemy targets by #3[i]%.

skills.name: Ode to Worldbearing
skills.simple_desc: Effective for the entire battle. After it is used on Phainon, Phainon immediately gains "Coreflame," increasing Khaslana's CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG. After the extra turns are depleted, the Transformation does not end, "Scourge" is granted, and all of Khaslana's extra turns get refreshed. At the start of Khaslana's extra turns, loses current HP. After attacking, deals Fire Additional DMG to random enemies.
skills.desc: Effective for the entire battle. After it is used on Phainon, Phainon gains #8[i] "Coreflame" as well as "Eternal Ignition" when Transforming. When Transforming, if "Coreflame" exceeds #5[i], for each point in excess, Khaslana's CRIT DMG increases by #6[i]%, up to a max increase of #7[i]%. While "Eternal Ignition" persists, increases Khaslana's CRIT Rate by #1[f1]%. After the extra turns are depleted, the Transformation does not end, and all of Khaslana's extra turns get refreshed and #9[i] "Scourge" is granted. At the start of extra turns, Khaslana consumes HP equal to #2[i]% of his current HP. After using an attack, deals #3[i] instances of Additional DMG, with each instance dealing Fire Additional DMG equal to #4[f1]% of Khaslana's ATK to one random enemy.

skills.name: Ode to Ocean
skills.simple_desc: One-time effect. When used on Hysilens, Hysilens gains "Flowing Warmth." After Hysilens uses an attack, consumes "Flowing Warmth" and regenerates Energy for this unit. Increases the DMG dealt by Hysilens. After Hysilens uses Basic ATK/Skill to attack enemies, causes all the DoT currently applied on the attacked enemy targets to immediately produce one instance of DMG.
skills.desc: One-time effect. When used on Hysilens, Hysilens gains "Flowing Warmth." After Hysilens uses an attack, consumes "Flowing Warmth" and regenerates #4[i] Energy for this unit. In this battle, increases the DMG dealt by Hysilens by #1[i]%. After Hysilens uses Basic ATK/Skill to attack enemies, causes all the DoT currently applied on the attacked enemy targets to immediately produce DMG equal to #2[i]%/#3[i]% of the original DMG.

skills.name: Ode to Law
skills.simple_desc: Effective for the entire battle. After using on Cerydra, increases the CRIT DMG of the character with "Military Merit." After Coup de Main ends, Cerydra immediately gains Charge.
skills.desc: Effective for the entire battle. After using on Cerydra, increases the CRIT DMG of the character with "Military Merit" by #1[i]%. After Coup de Main ends, Cerydra immediately gains #2[i] Charge.

skills.name: Ode to Time
skills.simple_desc: Effective for the entire battle. After it is used on Evernight, increases the DMG dealt when Evey uses the Memosprite Skill "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew." After Evernight uses Skill/Ultimate, additionally gains "Memoria." The CRIT DMG boost effect provided by the Skill is further increased.
skills.desc: Effective for the entire battle. After it is used on Evernight, increases the DMG dealt when Evey uses the Memosprite Skill "Dream, Dissolving, as Dew" by #1[i]%. After Evernight uses Skill/Ultimate, additionally gains #2[i] "Memoria." The CRIT DMG boost effect provided by the Skill is further increased by an amount equal to #3[i]% of Evernight's CRIT DMG.

skills.name: Ode to Earth
skills.simple_desc: When Demiurge uses Memosprite Skill, "Souldragon" deals Additional DMG after attacking and Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae gains "Ode to Earth": The "Bondmate" deals increased DMG. When used on Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae, advances Souldragon's action, and enables Souldragon's next action to gain the enhancement effect of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's Ultimate and increases the multiplier of the Shield provided.
skills.desc: When Demiurge uses Memosprite Skill, grants "Ode to Earth" to Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae, and enables the next #3[i] attack(s) of "Souldragon" to deal Additional DMG of the Bondmate's Type, equal to #4[i]% of the Bondmate's Shield Effect. When Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae holds "Ode to Earth," the "Bondmate" deals #1[f1]% increased DMG. When used on Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae, advances Souldragon's action by 100%. Souldragon's next action gains the enhancement effect of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's Ultimate and the Shield Effect provided by Souldragon is #5[i]% of its original Shield Effect. Does not consume the enhancement number of Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae's Ultimate.

skills.name: Ode to Ego
skills.simple_desc: For every 1 different teammate (i.e., excluding Demiurge) from whom Cyrene has gained "Recollection," additionally deals 1 instance of DMG to one random enemy when Demiurge uses "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes." After Cyrene uses Ultimate a certain number of times, Demiurge immediately gains 1 extra turn and automatically uses "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes."
skills.desc: For every 1 different teammate (i.e., excluding Demiurge) from whom Cyrene has gained "Recollection," additionally deals 1 instance of Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Demiurge's Max HP to one random enemy when Demiurge uses "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes." After Cyrene uses Ultimate or when Demiurge is summoned, Demiurge immediately gains 1 "Story." When "Story" reaches #2[i], Demiurge consumes all "Story" points to immediately gain 1 extra turn and automatically use "Minuet of Blooms and Plumes."

skill_trees.name: Child of Remembrance
skill_trees.desc: When a teammate's memosprite is summoned, it gains "Future." "Future" held by the memosprite won't be consumed.

skill_trees.name: Ripples Across Time
skill_trees.desc: When there are 1/2/3 Chrysos Heir or Remembrance characters (excluding Cyrene) in the team, Cyrene gains #1[i]/#2[i]/#3[i] "Recollection" point(s) respectively at the start of combat.

skill_trees.name: Causality in Trichotomy
skill_trees.desc: When Cyrene's SPD is #1[i] or higher, increases all allies' DMG dealt by #4[i]%. Then, for every 1 SPD that exceeds #1[i], increases Cyrene's and Demiurge's Ice RES PEN by #2[i]%. Up to a maximum of #3[i] excess SPD can be taken into account for this effect.
